article_title: Bevin exempts Medicaid from spending cuts but vows to end Kynect
article_text:
Bevin wants more money for social workers’ salaries and children’s advocacy centers

Bevin hopes to get federal waiver to redesign Medicaid

article_metadata.news-keywords: Matt, Bevin, budget, Medicaid, Kynect, salaries, social, workers, children's, advocacy, centers, Glenna, first, lady
article_metadata.description: Gov. Matt Bevin wants to spare the state’s Medicaid program from any immediate cuts and provide pay increases for social workers.
article_metadata.title: Bevin exempts Medicaid from spending cuts but vows to end Kynect | Lexington Herald-Leader
